Name: Moustache
Review Text: This is one of our favourite restaurants in Amsterdam. It has delicious antipasto, pizza's and pasta dishes. The staff are also very friendly. We usually bring all our overseas visitors here to show it off.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Such a cute restaurant! We arrived early for dinner so their menu was limited but SO good. The pizzas are delicious. The decor fits together perfectly & the staff was very friendly.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Though having 2 glasses of wine only I enjoyed bar. Very laid back vibe and nice staff. Oh my, sauvignon was good...

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Extremely nice restaurant and cafe, with friendly (though not overly attentive) staff and a great ambience. The food is good, the drinks too, and the atmosphere is warm and cozy.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Came for lunch. They have many lovely lemonades in unusual flavors (sweet potato + cinnamon, for example). The lunch menu is typical for a cafe (sandwiches, few warm pastas, few salads). I had the truffle egg salad, it was very tasty and a …

Name: Moustache
Review Text:
Nice location but super long times between service. We order one round of drinks and never got asked again if we would like another.
My friend says he comes a few times and this always happens. …

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Cute little restaurant just outside the busy part of the Amsterdam city centre. Trendy/hip atmosphere with worn furniture. Serves Italian cuisine which is very good. The squid starter is amazing! Pretty decent wine selection too, well if they actually have the bottle you pick... Friendly staff though.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Nice wines, good food, relaxed environment, and good service.. What more can you ask for?

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Decent service, but a bit slow. You will need to wave down your server, who forgot some drinks. …

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Very comfortable small restaurant in our neighborhood. Excellent pasta dishes but the run out quickly. Get there early to grab a seat. Wifi is also good if you need to catch up on work with a glass of good wine.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Carefully curated menu of sharing plates. Well prepared and presented.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Lovely cosy and warm cafe! Went just for a tea but couldn't resist the carrot cake in the counter so I ended up getting a piece! Plus, the employees are all super friendly! It's becoming  more and more popular among locals

Name: Moustache
Review Text: We loved the food but not the very slow service. By the time we got our mains, I was so hungry I didn't care they'd got my order wrong. Even so, I'd go back. The food was that good.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: The Good: Spoke perfect English when we made the reservation and charged us €19 for 5 ravioli, I seriously thought it was a appetizer. …

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Great atmosphere, warm and open place centrally located. Food is more than decent. Make sure you don't come at rush hour, they seem to be understaffed at times...

Name: Moustache
Review Text: I absolutely love this location and their atmosphere, but the food was over priced for the portions and the service was...non existent. Good place to go if you just want to chill and you're not expecting the most.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Excellent pizza and cozy atmosphere! The drinks were a bit uninspiring though. Very friendly staff and quick service.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Nice place, really good italian food. The Antipasti Mix is really tasteful and give an opportunity to discover new flavor. Prices are a little bit high but it worths it.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Busy, but very nice location.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: nice place and good prices, but we were waiting 5 minutes to see if we can have a seat and afterwards waited more than half an hour because waiter totally forgot our order. Also impolite service

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Worst pizza ever.  No oil, no seasoning, so dry. Also, the service was not good. Wouldn't go back... there are a million bars in Amsterdam - try another.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Bar Moustache is an easygoing place, good crowd, cool staff. One of my favorites for early saturday afternoon drinks that turn into dinner that turn into more drinks that turn into trouble, and waking up midday on Sunday with a new piercing …

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Very good restaurant for breakfast,lunch and dinner.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: This place served amazing food ...great atmosphere and reasonably priced.we had a mixture of starters , excellent rib eye steak , ravioli and semi freddo to finish

Name: Moustache
Review Text: We had their appetizer pizzas because we showed to before the dinner menu was served. Had some of their local brewed beer which was just okay.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Bismal food, slow service. One of our party ordered huevos rancheros and was served a plate of, basically, tomato soup with three raw eggs in.

Name: Moustache
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Good food and drinks. Nice wine. The staff are friendly and attentive. Great during the day and night.

Name: Moustache
